content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• Lab Production Attempt at (0.5, 2.5)
  Intended to serve as a research production facility by supplying Automation Science Packs. Multiple attempts were made to craft and place a Lab at this coordinate, but all efforts failed due to missing inventory items and unmet sub-ingredient dependencies.
• Smelting Operations (Informational)
  Although the agent interacted with furnaces during resource processing—an alternative furnace at (5.0, 5.0) for iron plate smelting and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper plate production—no new production structure was constructed on the map.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities() Usage Mistakes
  – Avoid using unsupported keyword parameters (such as “radius”) or providing unexpected positional arguments. Always verify the correct function signature before invocation.
• Lab Placement Failures
  – Confirm that a Lab item is available in inventory prior to placement. Validate both resource availability and placement conditions to prevent errors when attempting to deploy structures.
• Crafting Dependency Issues
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are sufficiently available or producible before initiating Lab crafting. Establish the necessary production chain for these intermediary items to avoid crafting failures.
• Iteration on NoneType
  – Check that retrieval functions yield valid, iterable results instead of None before performing operations that assume an iterable object.
